synopsis.text: Yukari, Ise, and a mysterious boy named Aoi welcome Himari Momochi to her inherited estate, the Momochi House, on her 16th birthday. Unbeknownst to her, this mansion lies on the threshold of the human and spirit realms. Aoi, burdened by a secret, reveals that he has taken Himari's rightful place as the guardian of the house, a role that confines him to the mansion and erases his presence in the human world. Ignoring his warnings to leave, Himari vows to help Aoi break the curse, delving into the enigmatic world of the youkai and uncovering her own family's hidden past. As she embarks on this supernatural journey, Himari is determined to restore Aoi's freedom and unravel the secrets of her bloodline.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
